Dyna-86>A 3000
0000:3000 MOV AL,4D
0000:3002 OUT 31,AL
0000:3004 OUT 29,AL
0000:3006 MOV AL,27
0000:3008 OUT 31,AL
0000:300A OUT 29,AL
0000:300C MOV AL,59
0000:300E OUT 30,AL
0000:3010 IN AL,29
0000:3012 TEST AL,02
0000:3014 JZ 3010
0000:3016 IN AL,28
0000:3018 MOV BL,AL
0000:301A INT 3
0000:301B


•
•
•
•
•
Dyna-86>A 5000
0000:5000 MOV AL,4D
0000:5002 OUT 31,AL
0000:5004 OUT 29,AL
0000:5006 MOV AL,27
0000:5008 OUT 31,AL
0000:500A OUT 29,AL
0000:500C MOV SI,6000
0000:500F MOV DI,8000
0000:5012 MOV CL,[SI]
0000:5014 INC SI
0000:5015 MOV AL,[SI]
0000:5017 OUT 30,AL
0000:5019 IN AL,29
0000:501B TEST AL,02
0000:501D JZ 5019
0000:501F IN AL,28
0000:5021 MOV [DI],AL
0000:5023 INC SI
0000:5024 INC DI
0000:5025 DEC CL
0000:5027 JNZ 5015
0000:5029 INT 3
0000:502A
